Class MasterNodeReadOperationRequest<T extends MasterNodeReadOperationRequest>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.ContextHolder

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusterHealthRequest, ClusterInfoRequest, ClusterSearchShardsRequest, ClusterStateRequest, GetAliasesRequest, GetIndexTemplatesRequest, GetRepositoriesRequest, GetSettingsRequest, IndicesExistsRequest, PendingClusterTasksRequest, TypesExistsRequest

    public abstract class MasterNodeReadOperationRequest<T extends MasterNodeReadOperationRequest>
extends MasterNodeOperationRequest<T>
    Base request for master based read operations that allows to read the cluster state from the local node if needed
